amendment.description: To increase, with an offset, by $1,582,700,000 over fiscal years 2006 through 2010 funding for Transportation (budget function 400) with the amount of the increase intended to be allocated to the Vehicle Systems account of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for subsonic and hypersonic aeronautics research.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 197 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 197 proposed by Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S2836-2837; text as modified: CR S2837) To increase, with an offset, by $1,582,700,000 over fiscal years 2006 through 2010 funding for Transportation (budget function 400) with the amount of the increase intended to be allocated to the Vehicle Systems account of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for subsonic and hypersonic aeronautics research.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 197 proposed by Senator Allen.
